name: fnopab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: -| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))

stmt.origin: mpbi(wfn(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wfn(c0, c1)
-| wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0))
-| wb(wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0)), wfn(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(c0, c1)
-| wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0))
-| wb(wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0)), wfn(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), weu(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(c0, c1)
-| wb(wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0)), wfn(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), weu(s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wral(s0, c1, weu(s1, w0)), wfn(c0, c1))
-| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wfn(c0, c1)
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), weu(s1, w0))
-| wceq(c0, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

comment: Functionality and domain of an ordered-pair class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 5-Mar-1996.)
